Adaora Onyechere bụ Nigerian Broadcast Journalist, entrepreneur, motivational speaker, poet nakwa   author
O so ndi na-gosipụta ihe nkiri a kpọrọ kakaki, kwa ụbọchị n'ụlọ ọrụ Africa Independent Television
Ọ bidoro ihe nkwupụta nke ya akpọrọ 'Talk2Adaora n'ụlọ ọrọ Kiss 99.9 FM nke dị n'Abuja ụbọchị Tuzedei ọbụla n'elekere anọ nke mgbede
Site na agụụ ikwado ụmụ nwaanyi ibe ya na-agụ ya , o guzobere otu a kpọrọ 'WEWE Network Afrique', WEWE, pụtara Women Enabling Women Everywher
Nke a metụtara mba Afrika niile Ihe nkwupụta ahụ o bidoro n'ụlọ ọrụ Kiss FM a kpọrọ Talk2Adaora bụ aka ọrụ ndi WEWE Network Afrique
Ọ bụkwa onye isi na nke a kpọrọ 'Signature Heels Media'
A mụrụ ya na Nigeria, Nne na nna ya bụ ndị Okigwe, otu n'ime, ọnụ obodo nke dị na steeti Imo State, , Adaora bụ nwa nke izizi n'ime ụmụ isii nne ya mụrụ

N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndi The Nation Newspaper, jụrụ ya, o kwuru na Nne naNna ya chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe mana ihụnanya o nwere ebe odide ihe di mere ka ọ gụọ  English Language nakwa ihe gbasara igụpụta akụkọ na Mgbasa Ozi
Adaora mara asụ asụsụ Igbo, Swahili, French nakwa Spanish
Adaora gụrụ praimari n'ụlọ akwụkwọ priveti a kpọrọ Starland bụ nke di na Lagos

Ọ gụrụ Sekọndiri  n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwaanyị dị na Owerri  Ọ gara n'ihu inweta A Level edukeshọn na IRWIN Koleji di na  England ọ nwetakwara  diploma na Law site na Coventry University tupu ọ gụcha na London Metropolitan University ka ọ gụchara ma nweta asambodo n'asụsụ Bekee nakwa mgbasa ozi na ịkọpụta akụkọ

Adaora gara n'ihu ịnwetakwa nzere mastas na creative writing ka ọ gụchara na  Oxford Brooks University   tỌ nwekwara asambodo na ihe nke akpọrọ 'BSL Level2' ya bụ ndị na- eji aka egosipụta ihe ndị dara ogbi na-ekwu
Asambodo ọzọ ọ nwetara bụkwa na Project Managemen
Ihe ọzọkwa ọ mara eme bụ ise ihe esere ese  ma tee ya penti
Tupu Adaora alaghachite azụ na Nigeria n'afọ 2009, Ọ deere ndi ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ a kpọrọ 'Worldview Magazine nke di na London U.K akụkọ dị iche iche gbasara ndụ ụmụ akwukwọ
Dika nwata akwụkwọ Adaora bidoro mgbasa ozi na ide ma igụpụta akụkọ na Conventry Student Radio, ọ bụ ebe ahụ ka o si ga nweta ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Channel 4 di na London
Ọ rukwara ọrụ na BEN TV di na London dika onye nhazi akụkọ na ederede nakwa onye na-akọpụta ma na-enyocha Fim ndi emere na Africa
A kpọrọ nke a'African Film Review' onye kwadoro ngosipụta nke a bụ nwa amadị ama ama n'ihe gbasara fim  bụ Film Producer Obi Emelonye

Ebe izizi ọ rụrụ ọrụ nta akụkọ na Nigeria dika onye na-akọwapụta ihe an-eme bụ  ụlọ ọrụ ndi 'Confluence Cable Network Limited' bụ nke di na Kogi State tupu nọ ga rụọ na Federal Radio Corporation of Nigeria, Vision FM nakwa DAAR Communications nke eji AIT mara.Ọ bu na AIT  ka ọ rụgidere dika onye na-ekwupụta ihe na-eme maọbụ otu aga-esi mee ihe tupu ọ hapụ AIT n'afọ 2018.  Mgbe ọ hapụrụ AIT ọ banyer e n'otu ndi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ndị pati a kpọrọ Action Alliance iji zọọ ọkwa 'State house Of Assembly' , mana onye otu Pati APGA meriri ya
N'otu aka ahụ Gọvanọ na-achị Imo Steeti bụ Chukwuemeka Ihedioha
nyere ya ọkwa dika onye ndụmọdụ ya n'ihe gbasara akụkọ di iche iche nakwa nkwado gbasara nhazi obodo Imo Steeti.
Adaora Onyechere dika ọ di ugbu a na-achịkọta ihe ana-emepụta nakwa ekwupụta bụ nke a kpọrọ  'Talk2Adaora n'ụlọ ọrụ Kiss 99.9FM
Nke a bụ nke na-eleba anya n'ihe gbasara nsogbu na-adapụta n'etiti ndi obodo na ndi na-achị ha nakwa ụzọ aga-esi gbochie ha
N'agbanyeghị ọrụ nta akụkọ Adaora bụ kwa odee akwụkwọ di iche iche  dika motivational book
ndị ọzọ gụnyere
Adaora bụkwa motivational speaker nakwa odee abụ ,ụfọdụ akwụkwọ abụ o dere gụnyere
'Certificate of Excellence for media excellence in Gender Advocacy as Host Gender Agenda' n'ụlọ ọrụ AIT nke ndị Career Gate Global USA nyere ya
Adaora bụ ya bidoro ọtụtụ non-governmental organization otu n'ime ha bụ 'Yellowjerrycan Save-A-Child-Lend-A-HAND' otu a na -ahụ maka ụmụnwaanyị na ụmụaka oke ịlụ ọgụ napụrụ ọnọdụ ha nọ na mbụ
Otu nke ọzọ bụ 'International Rise Up Against Rape' ntọala otu a bụ ibelata maọbụ kwụsi mkpagbu ụmụaka nakwa idina ụmụ nwaanyị n'ike akpọrọ child abuse na rape
N'afọ 2018, ya na ndị otu ya buru agha megide child mortality
Mgbe ọ gara Mahadum nke Metropolitan di na London o bidoro otu bandị mmadụ ise  akpọrọ 'Oasis' yanwa bụkwa onye isi ọgụ egwu ma na-akpọkwa Violin
